code: import React from'react';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navigation=()=>{const navItems=[{path:'/',label:'Dashboard',icon:'üìä'},{path:'/journal',label:'Journal',icon:'üìù'},{path:'/insights',label:'Insights',icon:'üí°'},{path:'/calendar',label:'Calendar',icon:'üìÖ'},{path:'/profile',label:'Profile',icon:'üë§'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav-list",children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{to:item.path,className:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return"nav-link ".concat(isActive?'nav-link--active':'');},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-label",children:item.label})]})},item.path))})});};export default Navigation;
